hooks.name: ruby-pre-commit
hooks.description: Run RuboCop on staged Ruby files before commit
hooks.command: git diff --cached --name-only --diff-filter=ACM | grep '\.rb$' | xargs -r bundle exec rubocop --force-exclusion

hooks.name: ruby-post-write
hooks.description: Suggest tests for newly created Ruby files

hooks.name: code-smell-logger
hooks.description: Log detected code smells after file writes to aid refactoring tracking

hooks.name: ruby-test-on-save
hooks.description: Run related tests when Ruby files are saved
